brp.regex: Enter a valid BRP number. For example, RZ1234567
brp.noBrpRecordMatch: Your BRP number does not match our records, Check you have entered the BRP number correctly

uan.regex: Enter a valid UAN. For example, 1111-2222-3333-4444
uan.noUanRecordMatch: Your UAN does not match our records, Check you have entered the UAN correctly

date-of-birth.before: Enter a date in the past
date-of-birth.date: Enter a valid date of birth

user-email.noRecordMatch: Your email does not match the other details given. Please enter the correct email
user-email.errorMessage: There is a problem with this service. Try again later
